item.description:
Two notes in consideration of our hosts.....                                                      *Please make reservations and cancelations within 48 hours of the scheduled meet-up in order to facilitate accurate accomodations.                                                               *Individual cheques are difficult with large groups.  Payment in cash is preferred and appreciated.                     Merci pour votre cooperation!

Allons feter cet bel ete avec des franchophones!   A bientot
item.how_to_find_us: The Merry Table Creperie in Portland's Old Port

group.name: The Portland French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Venez tous pour une soiree francaise
